mapper.select: select user_seq, user_name from users where user_seq != #{sendSeq} and user_name like concat('%', #{searchWord},'%')
select distinct friend_state from user_friend where (send_user_seq = #{sendSeq} and receive_user_seq = #{receiveSeq}) or (send_user_seq = #{receiveSeq} and receive_user_seq = #{sendSeq})
select friend_id, send_user_seq, receive_user_seq, friend_state from user_friend where friend_state = '002' and (send_user_seq = #{seq} or receive_user_seq = #{seq})
mapper.insert: insert into user_friend (send_user_seq, receive_user_seq, friend_state) values (#{sendSeq}, #{receiveSeq}, '001')
